TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStatelessServicePartition implements class System.Fabric.IServicePartition

summary.para: Represents a partition that is associated with a stateless service instance.

remarks.para: Provided to a stateless service as a parameter to the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportInstanceHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property, and health state.
Docs.summary: Reports health information on the current stateless service instance of the partition.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately by using .

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReportInstanceHealth(class System.Fabric.Health.HealthInformation healthInfo, class System.Fabric.Health.HealthReportSendOptions sendOptions) cil managed

Docs.param: The that describes the health report information, such as source, property and health state.

param.name: sendOptions
param.para: The that controls how the report is sent.

Docs.summary: Reports health information on the current stateless service instance of the partition.

remarks.para: The health information describes the report details, like the source ID, the property, the health state and other relevant details. The partition uses an internal health client to send the reports to the health store. The client optimizes messages to Health Manager by batching reports per a configured duration (Default: 30 seconds). If the report has high priority, you can specify send options to send it immediately.

exception.para: This indicates that the partition object is closed. The replica/replicator/instance has either been closed or is about to be closed.
